name: Product Purchases (excludes Neal's Yard Organic products)
description:
Use this option to pay for Optimum health & wellbeing products online using your credit/debit card.  

This excludes Neal's Yard Organic products which can be purchased on my Neal's Yard online webstore - https://uk.nyrorganic.com/shop/siancecil

Please call me for before purchasing and I will talk you through your online transaction.

name: Treatment Course
description:
Use this option to pay for a treatment course online using your credit/debit card.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Adjust quantity to reflect the cost of your chosen treatment course e.g. to pay for a Reflexology treatment course which costs £140 select a quantity of 140.
- Please call/email me immediately after making your purchase to confirm the treatments you require and to book your first appointment.

name: Single Treatment
description:
Use this option to pay for a treatment online using your credit/debit card.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Adjust quantity to reflect the cost of your chosen treatment e.g. to pay for a Reflexology treatment which costs £28 select a quantity of 28.
- Please call/email me immediately after making your purchase to confirm the treatment you require and to book your appointment.

name: Optimum health & wellbeing Gift Voucher
description:
Want to treat someone to the gift of wellbeing?  Does someone in your life deserve a little pampering? 

- Available in a range of designs 
- Available in monetary values of £10+ OR for a particular treatment or treatment course
- Customise your voucher with a message to the receipient
- Now on offer - BUY 2 GET 1 FREE!

Please call me before purchasing and I will talk you through your online transaction.
